file.name: NefEditorServer.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: nef Playgrounds - Server
  version: "1.0.0"

paths:
  /signin:
    post:
      summary: Sign in with Apple.
      operationId: signin
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/AppleSignInRequest"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: The request was successful.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/AppleSignInResponse'
        '500':
          description: The request was aborted.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NefEditorError'

components:
  schemas:

    AppleSignInRequest:
      type: object
      required:
        - identityToken
        - authorizationCode
      properties:
        identityToken:
          type: string
        authorizationCode:
          type: string

    AppleSignInResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - token
      properties:
        token:
          type: string

    NefEditorError:
      type: object
      required:
        - error
        - reason
      properties:
        error:
          type: boolean
        reason:
          type: string
